Title: Memory Leak in ValidationRules.debounced
Impact_User: Memory leaks in forms with debounced validators
Fix_Description: Form.dispose() now cleans up all fields including their validators

Title: Form Class Missing dispose() Method
Impact_User: Forms cannot be properly cleaned up
Impact_Business: SPA applications with dynamic forms will leak memory
Fix_Description: Added comprehensive dispose() method to Form class

Title: useSignal and useComputed Create Effects Without Cleanup
Impact_User: Memory leaks in components using useSignal/useComputed
Impact_System: Each effect creates observers that persist after unmount
Fix_Description: Modified to track effects in component.effects array for cleanup

Fix_Description: Removed debug logging code from useEffect

Fix_Description: Need to add dependency or handle gracefully

Impact_User: Memory leaks when destroying router instances
Fix_Description: Added dispose() with event listener cleanup
